sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 18th and 19th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail is groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 20th, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – These trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Very nice grooming on Buck’s Run. Classic tracks were deep and firm, although the wind had blown in some debris (oak leaves, pine needles, a few twigs). Still, great gliding on VR30 and some other prior waxes. Tracks were fast despite the extreme cold temps. The skating lane looked nice, it’s wide with just a slight ridge.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: They've finally got enough accumulation to make the golf course skiable. Used waxless rock skis and had a very nice time. Skied some in the woods, flats are doable but wouldn't try any hills, not enough snow yet.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Plenty of lake effect , combined with low 20 degree temps, plus the full big groom this morning , makes Nubs Knob red and blue trails as nice as it gets !

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 6 Lifts, Space Worm and the Rope Tow
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape. Trails will be groomed this morning.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: Winter is definitely here and today it's cold and snowy. The Grooming Crew finished their work early this morning and another 2 to 3 inches of light and dry snow landed on the corduroy. Most of the ski area will be covered in this beautiful snow. We sent a couple of cats back out to do a second groom on some of the beginner slopes. The XC trails and snowshoe trails continue to be in great shape. The Lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Pintail Peak lodge is open with a deli and an espresso bar. Bundle up and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
